[Blog post "Version 8 of Angular â€” Smaller bundles, CLI APIs, and alignment with the ecosystem"](https://blog.angular.io/version-8-of-angular-smaller-bundles-cli-apis-and-alignment-with-the-ecosystem-af0261112a27). + ### Release Highlights & Update instructions To learn about the release highlights and our CLI-powered automated update workflow for your projects please check out the [v8 release announcement](https://blog.angular.io/version-8-of-angular-smaller-bundles-cli-apis-and-alignment-with-the-ecosystem-af0261112a27).
